instructions: Tap the For You tab, then tap a Memory. Tap the Memory movie at the top of the screen to play it. To pause, tap the movie, then tap the Pause button . To go forward or backward in the movie, tap the movie, then slide the frames at the bottom of the screen left or right.

While a Memory movie is playing, tap the screen to show customization options. Do any of the following: Change the mood: Swipe left or right through the moods to change the music and editing style. Change the length: Swipe to change to short, medium, or long depending on the number of photos in the Memory. Personalize the movie: Tap Edit at the top of the screen to add or delete specific photos, change the music, edit the title, and more. Tap the Play button .

In the Photos tab, tap Days or Months. Tap the More Options button , then tap Play. While the movie plays, tap the screen, then tap Edit. Tap OK to add the movie to Memories, then make edits such as adding or deleting specific photos, changing the music, and editing the title. Tap Done.
Tap the For You tab, then tap a Memory. Tap the More Options button , then tap Delete Memory.
Tap the For You tab, then play the Memory you want to share. While the movie plays, tap the screen, tap the Share button , then choose how you want to share.
Tap the For You tab, then tap a Memory you want to mark as a favorite. Tap the More Options button , then tap Add to Favorite Memories.

Tap the For You tab, then tap a Memory with photos you want to share. Tap Select, then tap the photos you want to share. Tap the Share button , then choose how you want to share them. Photos suggests sharing the photos with the people in them. You can choose who to share with, as well as add others.

Unlock your iPhone. Double-click the Home button to show the App Switcher. (On iPhone X and later, swipe up from the bottom edge and pause to show the App Switcher.) Tap the button that appears at the bottom of the screen to open the same item on your iPhone.
